testsuite.name: users.UsersEmailFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersEmailPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method validates Email field placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Email* text is displayed in the Email placeholder TC_usersEmailPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersEmailEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for empty Email field in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Email field Entered text "" in the Users screen Email field Required error message is displayed TC_usersEmailEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersEmailMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Email Add screen Email field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Email field Entered text "tBO" in the Users screen Email field Must be a valid email error message is displayed TC_usersEmailMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersEmailSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Email field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Email text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersEmailSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersEmailMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Email Add screen Email field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Email field Entered text "IGHKAkWjRDbmEyJloVDedFoFVtoOnHYhMUpDMRxjiAoPWWaazAsopibvWtSEPMQhInSnboLHkFcUXAjCjtSmGZlOmaNlWyg@gmail.com" in the Users screen Email field Must not exceed 100 characters error message is displayed TC_usersEmailMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed
